messages.message: Welcome to the party!  Please enter your name, and name your game!
Welcome to {GNAME}! Please enter your name!
Hi {PNAME}, thanks for joining {GNAME}, we're waiting for more players to join.
Hi {PNAME}, thanks for joinging {GNAME}, please wait for the next round.
{PNAME}, thanks for waiting, here we go!
{PNAME}, are you ready to play?
OK {PNAME}, what do you want to write about?
Your prompt is {PROMPT} -- now write about it!
It's time to guess!
Here is what's left...
Way to go {PNAME}, you won with {POINTS} points!
I like this game, another!
OK {PNAME}, we're sorry to see you to.

message: Welcome to the game, we need more players!
Let's get this party started, start signing in!
Welcome to {PNAME} game!  Waiting for more players to join!
{PNAME} priority number one: go dig up more players!
Lets get more players up in here!
We've got enough, we'll start when everyone is ready!
Still accepting applicants -- but the game starts when everyone is "Ready".

messages.message: Vote for your favorite!
So what do you think about this:
You wrote about "{PROMPT}"  Who said what?
Here are the results for this round... Your prompt was "{PROMPT}" --

message: {POINTS} points was the winning score. Ready up to try for better!
Squeaked by with {POINTS} points. Can you do better in another game?
{POINTS} is a respectable score... NOT! Beat it in the next game!
{PNAME}, you sure you guys didn't just vote for eachother the whole game?
{PNAME}... a draw? Someone didn't try hard enough.
{POINTS} apiece. Well done. Don't tie next game.
You each had {POINTS}. One of you do better next time.

messages.message: It's time to choose a prompt!
You've chosen your prompt...
The Players have spoken!
Guess Results
It's time for another round of guessing!
That's it for this round!  Onward and upward...

message: What? To the end of the game?!?
Someone had to go and get the winning score.
There's a winner?  The suspense is killing me!
Nobody's won yet?  You guys are slow.

messages.message: We're starting a fresh round, get ready to go!

message: {PNAME} is raising the room's IQ. {POINTS} points.
Did you forget to guess something?
Free points are almost as good as free money.
Gotta stay unguessed to get points!
You should be ashamed of yourselves.
No points for a bad guess.

messages.message: This is a game of "Who said it?" where players pick a prompt, respond to it and try and guess who said what! Earn points by guessing correctly, and more by being the only one to guess right.  Get even more points for every round you stump the competition and remain unguessed.  Good luck!
